SELECT ic.comment_level, ic.content, ic.sepc_name, ic.created_time, u.face AS user_face, u.nickname FROM items_comments AS ic LEFT JOIN users AS u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id AS item_id, i.item_name, i.sell_counts, ii.url AS img_url, temp_spec.price_discount AS price FROM items AS i LEFT JOIN items_img AS ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id, MIN(price_discount) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) AS temp_spec ON i.id = temp_spec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name LIKE #{keywords}
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts DESC
temp_spec.price_discount ASC
i.item_name ASC
